levels.Ⅰ: :effect_map: Until the end of the round during combat, gain an extra 1 Ballista.</br></br>When player, this card counts as a Ballista.
levels.Ⅳ: :effect_map: Until the end of the round during combat, gain an extra 1 Ballista. This and 1 other Ballista can be activated now.</br></br>When player, this card counts as a Ballista.
levels.Ⅵ: :effect_map: Until the end of the round during combat, gain an extra 1 Ballista. This and all other Ballistas can be activated now.</br></br>When player, this card counts as a Ballista.
